pricing.compareFeaturesDesc: See exactly what's included in each plan

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions about our pricing? We're here to help.
faq.stillHaveQuestions: Still have questions? Our support team is here to help.
faq.q1: What are credits and how do they work?
faq.a1: Credits are our usage-based currency. Each AI feature consumes credits: Text-to-Speech uses 1 credit per character, Music Generation uses 200 credits per 30 seconds, Voice Cloning uses 2,000 credits to create a voice model, and Voice Isolator uses 100 credits per minute.
faq.q2: Do unused credits roll over to the next month?
faq.a2: Yes! Unused credits automatically roll over to the next billing cycle. You can accumulate up to 3 months worth of credits, giving you flexibility in how you use VeeqAI.
faq.q3: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.a3: Absolutely! You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Your plan will remain active until the end of your current billing period, and you'll keep all unused credits.
faq.q4: What's the difference between monthly and yearly billing?
faq.a4: Yearly billing gives you a 17% discount (equivalent to 2 months free) and is billed once per year. Monthly billing is charged every month. Both options include the same features and credit allocations.
faq.a5: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you're not satisfied with VeeqAI within the first 14 days, contact our support team for a full refund.
faq.q6: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
faq.a6: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately with prorated billing. Downgrades take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.
faq.a7: Yes! API access is available starting from the Starter plan. The Professional plan includes dedicated endpoints and higher rate limits for enterprise applications.
faq.a8: Yes, we offer custom enterprise solutions for large organizations. This includes custom pricing, SLA guarantees, SSO support, and dedicated account management.

creditSystem.title: Credit System Explained
creditSystem.subtitle: Our transparent credit system ensures you only pay for what you use. No hidden fees, no surprise charges.

enterprise.description: Need a custom plan? We offer enterprise solutions with unlimited credits and dedicated support.

intro.title: Introduction

intro.description: Welcome to Veeq AI — your gateway to cutting-edge AI audio technology. Our API empowers developers, artists, and creators to generate, transform, and remix audio in revolutionary ways.

about.title: About Veeq AI
about.subtitle: We're revolutionizing content creation by making professional audio accessible to everyone through cutting-edge AI technology. Whether you're a YouTuber, podcaster, or business owner, our platform empowers you to create studio-quality audio without the traditional barriers of cost, complexity, or time.

userCentric.description: Every decision we make starts with our users. We listen, iterate, and improve based on real feedback from the creators who use our platform daily.

speed.title: Speed & Simplicity
speed.description: Time is the most valuable resource for creators. We obsess over making our platform fast, intuitive, and efficient so you can focus on what matters most.
speed.tagline: Removing friction from the creative process

accessibility.title: Global Accessibility
accessibility.description: Great ideas come from everywhere. We build technology that works for creators across languages, cultures, and geographies.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Veeq AI was founded with a clear goal: to make professional audio technologies accessible to everyone. We transform high-cost, time-consuming, and complex audio production processes into simple, fast, and affordable solutions through our AI-powered software.
story.paragraph2: Our founders combined their expertise in software development and audio technologies to create a platform capable of producing studio-quality voiceovers, music, and audio content entirely in a digital environment. This eliminates the need for expensive equipment, lengthy production cycles, and large teams.
story.paragraph3: Today, Veeq AI supports thousands of users worldwide — from YouTubers and podcasters to media agencies and corporate brands — by empowering their content creation processes with the strength of software. Our mission is to make professional audio technology available to anyone, anywhere.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: VEMLO YAZILIM BİLGİ İLETİŞİM TEKNOLOJİLERİ REKLAM PAZARLAMA LİMİTED ŞİRKETİ ("we," "us," or "our") operates the VeeqAI platform. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our artificial intelligence voice services.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.content: When you create an account or use our services, we may collect personal information including your name, email address, payment information, and account preferences.

voice.title: Voice Data
voice.content: We collect audio recordings and voice samples that you provide to train AI models, generate synthetic speech, or use voice cloning features. This data is processed to provide our AI voice services.

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.content: We automatically collect information about how you interact with our platform, including IP addresses, browser information, device identifiers, and usage patterns.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our AI voice services
howWeUse.item2: Process voice cloning and text-to-speech requests
howWeUse.item4: Communicate with you about service updates and support
howWeUse.item5: Ensure platform security and prevent fraud
howWeUse.item6: Comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

providers.title: Service Providers
providers.content: With third-party vendors who assist in providing our services

legal.title: Legal Requirements
legal.content: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety

business.title: Business Transfers
business.content: In connection with mergers, acquisitions, or asset sales

consent.title: Consent
consent.content: With your explicit consent for specific purposes

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information, including encryption, secure servers, and access controls. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. Voice data used for AI training may be retained longer to maintain model quality.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:
yourRights.access: Access and update your personal information
yourRights.delete: Delete your account and associated data
yourRights.object: Object to or restrict certain processing activities
yourRights.portability: Data portability for your personal information
yourRights.withdraw: Withdraw consent where processing is based on consent

internationalTransfers.title: International Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your information may be processed and stored in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for international data transfers.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 years of age.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the new policy on our platform and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:
contact.subject: Subject

agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: These Terms of Service ("Terms") constitute a legally binding agreement between you and VEMLO YAZILIM BİLGİ İLETİŞİM TEKNOLOJİLERİ REKLAM PAZARLAMA LİMİTED ŞİRKETİ ("Company," "we," "us," or "our") regarding your use of the VeeqAI platform and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

services.title: Description of Services
services.intro: VeeqAI provides artificial intelligence-powered voice services including:
services.cloning: Voice cloning and custom voice generation
services.api: API access for developers and enterprises

account.title: Account Registration and Security
account.responsibility: You must create an account to access certain features. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities under your account.
account.accuracy: You must provide accurate and complete information during registration and keep your account information updated.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use Policy
acceptableUse.intro: You agree NOT to use our services to:
acceptableUse.laws: Create content that violates any laws or regulations
acceptableUse.consent: Generate voices without proper consent from the voice owner
acceptableUse.misleading: Create misleading, defamatory, or fraudulent content
acceptableUse.impersonate: Impersonate others or misrepresent your identity
acceptableUse.harassment: Generate content for harassment, bullying, or threats
acceptableUse.intellectual: Violate intellectual property rights of third parties
acceptableUse.reverse: Attempt to reverse engineer or hack our systems
acceptableUse.resell: Share or resell access to our services without authorization

yourContent.title: Your Content
yourContent.content: You retain ownership of any original content you provide, but you grant us a license to process, store, and use your content to provide our services.

generated.title: Generated Content
generated.content: Content generated using our AI services is subject to our usage policies. You are responsible for ensuring you have proper rights and permissions for any voice data you use.

voiceConsent.title: Voice Consent
voiceConsent.content: You must obtain explicit consent before cloning or using someone else's voice. We may require proof of consent for certain uses.

payment.title: Payment and Billing
payment.credits: Our services operate on a credit-based system. You can purchase credits or subscribe to plans as outlined on our pricing page.
payment.processing: All payments are processed securely through third-party payment processors. Refunds are subject to our refund policy.
payment.pricing: We reserve the right to modify pricing with 30 days' notice to existing users.

availability.title: Service Availability and Performance
availability.content: While we strive for high availability, we do not guarantee uninterrupted access to our services. We may perform maintenance, updates, or experience technical issues that temporarily affect service availability.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The VeeqAI platform, including software, algorithms, and user interfaces, is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works without our permission.

privacy.title: Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: Our collection and use of your information is governed by our Privacy Policy. By using our services, you consent to our data practices as described in the Privacy Policy.

service.title: Service Disclaimer
service.content: Our services are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or quality of generated content.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, our liability is limited to the amount you paid for services in the 12 months preceding any claim.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of our services, violation of these Terms, or infringement of third-party rights.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account at any time for violation of these Terms or for any other reason with or without notice. You may terminate your account at any time through your account settings.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law and Disputes
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by Turkish law. Any disputes shall be resolved through arbitration or in the courts of Turkey, as applicable.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of significant changes and your continued use constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.intro: For questions about these Terms, please contact us:
contact.subject: Subject

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit our website. VEMLO YAZILIM BİLGİ İLETİŞİM TEKNOLOJİLERİ REKLAM PAZARLAMA LİMİTED ŞİRKETİ uses cookies to improve your experience on the VeeqAI platform, provide personalized services, and analyze website usage.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.
essential.examples: Login status, security tokens, user preferences

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.description: These cookies collect information about how you use our website to help us improve performance.
performance.examples: Page views, bounce rates, feature usage statistics

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization.
functional.examples: Theme selection, language choice, custom voice settings

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies track your online activity to help advertisers deliver relevant advertisements.
marketing.examples: Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, advertising identifiers

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.intro: We may use third-party services that place cookies on your device:

googleAnalytics.title: Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.description: Helps us understand website usage and improve user experience.

paymentProcessors.title: Payment Processors
paymentProcessors.description: Secure payment processing for subscriptions and credit purchases.

customerSupport.title: Customer Support
customerSupport.description: Chat widgets and support tools for customer assistance.

cdnServices.title: CDN Services
cdnServices.description: Content delivery networks to improve website performance.

session.title: Session Cookies
session.description: Temporary cookies that are deleted when you close your browser. Used for essential functions like maintaining your login session.

persistent.title: Persistent Cookies
persistent.description: Remain on your device for a set period or until manually deleted. Used for remembering preferences and improving user experience across visits.

browserSettings.title: Browser Settings
browserSettings.intro: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Here's how to manage cookies in popular browsers:
browserSettings.chrome: Settings > Privacy and Security > Cookies and other site data
browserSettings.firefox: Settings > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data
browserSettings.edge: Settings > Site Permissions > Cookies and stored data

cookieBanner.title: Cookie Banner
cookieBanner.description: When you first visit our website, you'll see a cookie banner where you can choose which types of cookies to accept. You can change these preferences at any time through the cookie settings link in our footer.

accountSettings.title: Account Settings
accountSettings.description: Logged-in users can manage certain cookie preferences through their account settings, including analytics and marketing cookies.

impact.title: Impact of Disabling Cookies
impact.warning: Disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website and services.
impact.essential: Essential cookies: Disabling these will prevent core functionality
impact.performance: Performance cookies: You may experience slower load times and reduced optimization
impact.functional: Functional cookies: Personalization features may not work properly
impact.marketing: Marketing cookies: You may see less relevant advertisements

mobileApps.title: Mobile Applications
mobileApps.content: Our mobile applications may use similar tracking technologies. You can control these through your device settings or app preferences. Refer to your device's help documentation for specific instructions.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the updated policy on our website and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us:
contact.subject: Subject

additionalResources.title: Additional Resources
additionalResources.intro: For more information about cookies and online privacy, visit:

contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team. We're here to help with any questions about Veeq AI and how our platform can transform your content creation workflow.

introduction.title: Introduction

rateLimits.title: Rate Limits
rateLimits.description: Understanding rate limiting and how to handle it in your applications.

understanding.title: Understanding Rate Limits
understanding.description: Our API implements rate limiting to ensure fair usage and maintain service quality for all users. Rate limits are applied per API key and reset every minute.

headers.title: Rate Limit Headers
headers.description: Every API response includes headers that help you track your rate limit status:

limit.name: X-RateLimit-Limit
limit.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per minute

remaining.name: X-RateLimit-Remaining
remaining.description: The number of requests remaining in the current window

reset.name: X-RateLimit-Reset
reset.description: Unix timestamp when the rate limit window resets

monitor.title: Monitor Rate Limit Headers
monitor.description: Always check the rate limit headers in responses to avoid hitting limits

backoff.title: Implement Exponential Backoff
backoff.description: Use exponential backoff when retrying failed requests

cache.title: Cache Responses
cache.description: Cache API responses when possible to reduce API calls

batch.title: Batch Requests
batch.description: Group multiple operations into single requests when supported

upgrade.title: Upgrade Your Plan
upgrade.description: Consider upgrading to Pro or Enterprise for higher rate limits

help.title: Get Help
help.description: Our developer support team is here to help you integrate Veeq AI into your applications successfully.
